response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth surpasses $15,000, but considering the current market dynamics and your potential interest, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $18,000. This is a limited-time offer, and I trust that you will appreciate the quality and significance of this product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable item with you.", "product_price": 18000}
